The user of this Special Skill can accomplish missions and objectives when playing scenarios, even if he does not have one of the roles specified as a Specialist Troop in the scenario.

{{css_skillbox |black| SPECIALIST OPERATIVE | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{effects}}
* Playing a mission or a scenario, the user of this Special Skill is considered to be a [[Specialist Troop]] and may use the special rules the mission or scenario specifies for this type of Trooper.
* The user of this Special Skill will be considered to be a Specialist Troop, even if he doesn't fulfill any of the defining characteristics of this type of Trooper (not being an [[Engineer]], [[Doctor]], [[Hacker]], etc.) in the scenario rules.
{{css_skillbox-end}}
